content.body: shu: Take a look at the “What methodology was used” disclosure element at the end of this section: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-bind-this#bind-and-call-are-very-common.

content.body:
Basically, download Gzemnid’s slim.code.js.txt.lz4 and search.topcode.sh.
Then run:
```bash
./search.topcode.sh '\.bind\b' | awk 'END { print NR }’
```
…or whatever.
